name: Stikky Runner
description:
Stikky Runner is a small platformer game made in construct 3. It aims to be very hard and even has a rage-game-mode.

You move and jump with the arrow keys or A and D double press the up-arrow or space to double jump and press escape to exit to the main menu.

Please leave a rating and have fun!

If the site scrolls instead of moving the player click on the game-window
